content: to end of round 20 24 sts decreased 70 84 sts remain rnd5 cc *sl1yo brp1* repeat rnd6 mc *brk1 sl1yo* repeat rnd6 cc *sl1yo brp1* repeat rnd7 mc * brk1 sl1yo 2 times br4stdec sl1yo brk1 sl1yo 2 times * repeat 4 5 6 more times to end of round 20 24 sts decreased 50 60 sts remain rnd7 cc *sl1yo brp1* repeat rnd8 mc *brk1 sl1yo* repeat rnd8 cc *sl1yo brp1* repeat rnd9 mc *brk1 sl1yo br4stdec sl1yo brk1 sl1yo * repeat 4 5 6 more times to end of round 20 24 sts decreased 30 36 sts remain rnd9 cc *sl1yo brp1* repeat rnd10 mc *brk1 sl1yo* repeat rnd10 cc *sl1yo brp1* repeat rnd11 mc * br4stdec sl1yo * repeat 4 5 6 more times to end of round 20 24 sts decreased 10 12 sts remain rnd11 cc *sl1yo brp1* repeat rnd12 mc *brk1 sl1yo* repeat rnd12 cc *sl1yo brp1* repeat break cc yarn and pull inside rnd13 mc *sl1 k1 pass slipped st over * repeat 5 6 sts decreased 5 6 sts remain finishing break mc yarn and place on tapestry needle weave strand through the remaining sts and pull close weave in ends separately block the finished star aggressively pinning out each point as much as possible to smooth stitches and to sharp the points © katrinschubert 2016 in purchasing this pattern you agree to print and use this pattern only for your personal non commercial use you may not distribute or sell electronic or paper copies of this pattern if you have any questions about the pattern please contact katrin@wasserturm rummelsburg de november mood 3 all rights reserved ©2016 katrinschubert
